name: Maven Ventures
tag_list: executive-search, ceo, cto, cmo, founder, headhunter
overview:
Maven is a pan-European Executive Search & Assessment firm exclusively serving Investors and the Investor- backed Technology, Media and Telecom ecosystem across EMEA.

Maven assists organisations attract & secure top flight Board members, CEO, CXO, VP and Director level hires. They have a strong track record in relocating Europeans back to Europe from the US and APAC having operated internationally.

Clients are private and public-to-private TMT companies going through a period of rapid change. They appreciate how to operate in complex multi-stakeholder situations.

The team has worked on in excess of 386 engagements over the last decade and openly introduce Entrepreneurs to private equity/debt and venture capital funding.

Functional Expertise covers:

Board: Chairman, Non Executives and Advisory Panel C-Class: CEO, CFO, CMO, CPO, COO VP level: VP EMEA, General Manager, Sales, Marketing, Business
Developement, Product, Corporate Development, VP Manufacturing Director: ‘Head of’, Country Manager, Account Director.

For Investment Funds, our track record covers:

                 Partner
                 Investment Director 
                 EiR 
                 Venture Partner 
                 Associates
